segments.text: Peering into the kitchen, I see the woman at work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, towel in hand, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then my eyes catch the faucet spewing water endlessly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing, creating a hazardous flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it, clueless and composed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Shifting focus, the boy climbs the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand dives into the cookie jar triumphantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool tilts, threatening to spill him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, arm extended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky operation amuses me despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden beyond the window beckons with tranquility.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad that such a nice day hides indoor perils.
segments.speaker: PAR
